last_episode_to_air.name: Memories of School Days / Boy Meets Girl = Battle! / Pinky Swear
last_episode_to_air.overview: Caiman tries to convince Nikaido to return to the Hole with him, but her contract with En binds her. After the fight, En launches a search for her.

name: Dorohedoro
overview: The story revolves around Kaiman, who does not remember who he was before he was transfigured by a Magic user. This transformation left him with a reptile's head, and a desire to find out the truth about who he really is. Accompanied by Nikaido, his female companion, he tracks down Magic Users in "The Hole" and unceremoniously chomps down on their head, hoping to find out who it was that put him in this state. One by one, they witness this "second man" inside the head of Kaiman, and after pulling them back out of his mouth he asks them all a question.
tagline: What did the guy inside my head say?

episodes.name: Caiman
episodes.overview: Caiman and Nikaido hunt for the sorcerer who cursed him with a lizard's head, while Fujita returns to the Hole to avenge Matsumura's death.

episodes.name: In the Bag / Eat Quietly During Meals / My Neighbor the Sorcerer
episodes.overview: "Cleaners" Shin and Noi get to work in the Hole. Meanwhile, Caiman and Nikaido search for a sorcerer who uses acupuncture to change faces.

episodes.name: Night of the Dead / Duel! In Front of Central Department Store
episodes.overview: Caiman and Nikaido take part in the annual Night of the Living Dead. But before they can finish their mission, Shin and Noi show up to finish them.

episodes.name: Roast Duck With Magic User Sauce / Formal Attire Requested / Another Year in the Hole
episodes.overview: En consults his comrade Turkey, whose magical dolls may identify the "lizard guy." Caiman and Nikaido visit Kasukabe, a professor studying sorcerers.

episodes.name: Caiman in Wonderland
episodes.overview: In the sorcerers' world, Caiman and Nikaido locate a man with cross eyes, but the trail goes cold when Shin and Noi show up on a mission.

episodes.name: The Mushrooms Are Ready / The First Smoke / Manhole Elegy
episodes.overview: En's mushroom magic gravely injures Nikaido when she infiltrates his mansion. Dr. Vaux and Professor Kasukabe tell Caiman about Shin's dark past.

episodes.name: The All-Star ☆ Dream Game
episodes.overview: Plotting to avenge Matsumura, Fujita joins the Hole Peace Hospital’s baseball team: their rival team has his friend's killer Caiman on the roster.

episodes.name: A Good Day to Leave / Lalala Monsterman / Splendid & Exuberant / Welcome to Blue Night Land
episodes.overview: Fearing for Nikaido’s safety, Caiman returns to the sorcerers' world alone. The En family begins preparations for the Blue Night Party festivities.

episodes.name: Ah, Flower Smoke / Wonderful Meat Pie / Blue Night Day 2 / Blue Night Day 3 / The Strange Mushroom Appears!
episodes.overview: Caiman sneaks into the festival grounds in pursuit of Risu. Meanwhile, En tells Fujita the story of how Shin and Noi became partners.

episodes.name: Lonely Caiman / Before Nightmare / Manju Terror
episodes.overview: Nikaido dons a powerful mask to defeat her enemy, only to find the attack was a trap by En. With Tanba's help, Caiman visits one of the Cross-Eyes.

episodes.name: The Boss / See You at the Food Stall
episodes.overview: As a member of the family, Nikaido learns why En needs a sorcerer who can manipulate time. Caiman disguises himself as Tanba's wife to rescue her.

episodes.name: Memories of School Days / Boy Meets Girl = Battle! / Pinky Swear
episodes.overview: Caiman tries to convince Nikaido to return to the Hole with him, but her contract with En binds her. After the fight, En launches a search for her.
